name: Laravel-4-Snippets-Movibe
tagline: Laravel 4 Snipeets for Sublime Text 2 version Movibe
body:
Laravel 4 Snippets version Movibe
=================

Emmet style Laravel 4 snippets for __Sublime Text 2__. 

I used Laravel 4 source to create nice collection of snippets. 

For longer names there are handy tab-trigger aberrations. 

So for `{{ Form::text($name, $value, $attributes) }}` you can just use `Form-text`.

Installation
---------------

Open Sublime Text 2 -> Package Manager: Add Repository => and copy and paste this repository
    https://github.com/movibe/Laravel-4-Snippets.git

**Available at Package Manager! just search for Laravel 4**.

Thanks
---------------
Original Source:
https://github.com/bliker/laravel4-snippets
